sentences.en: And the average temperature has already passed 38 degrees Celsius.
sentences.cn: 平均气温已经超过38度了.

sentences.en: At what temperature do Fahrenheit and Celsius thermometers give the same numerical reading?
sentences.cn: 在什么温度时华氏温度计和摄氏温度计指示的读数相同?

sentences.en: He got a temperature of 40 Celsius, his face was burning up.
sentences.cn: 他高烧烧到了40度, 脸都发红了.
最高温度11摄氏度，即52华氏度。
最高温度11摄氏度，即52华氏度。

sentences.en: However, they will still have to endure temperatures of around - 20 degrees Celsius.
sentences.cn: 然而, 他们仍然必须忍受零下20摄氏度的低温.

sentences.en: It will be a mild night, around nine degrees Celsius.
sentences.cn: 晚间天气温和，温度约九摄氏度。

sentences.en: Night temperatures can drop below 15 degrees Celsius.
sentences.cn: 夜间气温会降到15摄氏度以下。

sentences.en: Pure water sometimes does not freeze until it reaches minus 40 degrees Celsius.
sentences.cn: 纯净水有时候要降到零下40摄氏度才会结冰。

sentences.en: Temperatures have peaked at over thirty degrees Celsius.
sentences.cn: 温度最高达30摄氏度以上。

sentences.en: The maximum temperature in July may be 36 Celsius degree.
sentences.cn: 七月份最高温度可能达到36摄氏度.

sentences.en: The star's surface temperature is reckoned to be minus 75 degrees Celsius.
sentences.cn: 这颗恒星的表面温度估计在零下75摄氏度左右。

sentences.en: The temperature is usually between 300 and 675 degrees Celsius.
sentences.cn: 温度通常在摄氏300度到675度之间.

sentences.en: The temperature tonight will fall to seven degrees Celsius.
sentences.cn: 今晚气温将下降到七摄氐度.

sentences.en: The thermometer shows the temperature in Celsius and Fahrenheit.
sentences.cn: 这支温度计标有摄氏和华氏两种温度。

sentences.en: Water freezes at 32 degrees Fahrenheit ( 32 F ) or zero / nought degrees Celsius ( 0 C ).
sentences.cn: 水结成冰的温度是32华氏度 ( 32 ) 或零摄氏度 ( 0℃ ).

trans.tran_en: Celsius is a scale for measuring temperature, in which water freezes at 0 degrees and boils at 100 degrees. It is represented by the symbol °C.
a scale of temperature in which water freezes at 0˚ and boils at 100˚
